title: LF for Plat+ team to join for Season 8
body:
Looking to join a ranked 5s team in Season 8 or find a jungle duo. Top main but can play any role comfortably. Currently Platinum 4.
IGN: HyperSmash or HyperForce

replies.body: Hey I've got you added already if you'd be keen to try out with us. We need a top main
yo add RequieM 1 if you're interested in a mid duo/making a team.
